title: [Neuroscience] Cannabinol, an active ingredient in cannabis, can help protect brain cells from oxidative damage & preserve mitochondrial function, two of the major contributors to Alzheimerâ€™s. It could lead to the development of new therapeutics for treating this disease & other neurodegenerative disorders.

[Health] AI can identify heart disease from an eye scan. Scientists have developed an artificial intelligence system that can analyse eye scans taken during a routine visit to an optician or eye clinic and identify patients at a high risk of a heart attack.
